name: Stay Focus
description:
Welcome to Stay Focus ! A rhythm game based not on sounds and music but on erotic images. The goal is to stay focused throughout the game and quickly identify the anatomy presented in each displayed image.



Each stage features a girl, and there are two modes available for each of them. Complete the normal mode to unlock the next girl, and if you feel confident, try to unlock the image gallery by facing the hard mode.



Unlocking the gallery of a stage gives you access to all the photos of a girl that you can admire at your leisure (over 120 photos per stage), and it will remain a challenge that anyone can overcome after a few tries.



Finally, be aware that all models included in this game are at least 21 years old, and this game is reserved for adults as it includes images of both partial and full nudity.
